SELECT
 _id FROM
 entries
 WHERE
 downloaded = 0 AND (
 read_state < 1 OR
 starred_state > 0 OR
 entries.type = "N")

SELECT
 _id,
 -- read-all-mark
 SUM(read_freq+unread_freq) AS frequency,
 -- read-all-mark-end
 -- read-unread-only-mark
 SUM(unread_freq) AS frequency,
 -- read-unread-only-mark-end
 SUM(unread_freq) AS sum_unread_freq,
 ord
, feed_id
 
 FROM(
 SELECT
 "all articles" AS _id,
 -100 AS ord,
 COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 
 0 AS unread_freq
, -1 as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 WHERE 
 entries.read_state = 1
 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 UNION

SELECT
 "all articles" AS _id,
 -100 AS ord,
 0 AS read_freq, 
 COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
, -1 as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 WHERE 
 entries.read_state < 1
 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 
 

UNION

SELECT 
 lower(feeds.title) AS _id,
 0 AS ord, 
 COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 
 0 AS unread_freq
, feeds._id as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries, 
 feeds 
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 

WHERE 
 entries.read_state = 1 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id 
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 

GROUP BY 
 feeds.title, feeds._id
UNION

SELECT 
 lower(feeds.title) AS _id,
 0 AS ord, 
 0 AS read_freq, 
 COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
, feeds._id as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries, 
 feeds 
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 

WHERE 
 entries.read_state < 1 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id 
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 

GROUP BY 
 feeds.title, feeds._id)
 

GROUP BY ord, _id, feed_id

SELECT _id AS _id, sum_freq AS frequency, sum_unread_freq, ord
FROM dashboard_view
WHERE frequency > 0

SELECT _id AS _id, sum_unread_freq AS frequency, sum_unread_freq, ord
FROM dashboard_view
WHERE sum_unread_freq > 0

CREATE VIEW\n dashboard_view\n AS\n SELECT _id, ord, SUM(read_freq) AS sum_read_freq, SUM(unread_freq) AS sum_unread_freq, SUM(read_freq+unread_freq) AS sum_freq
FROM(
SELECT lower(labels.name) AS _id, 50 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries, entry_label_associations AS elas, labels
WHERE entries.read_state = 1 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id AND elas.label_id = labels._id
GROUP BY _id
UNION
SELECT lower(labels.name) AS _id, 50 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries, entry_label_associations AS elas, labels
WHERE entries.read_state < 1 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id AND elas.label_id = labels._id AND lower(labels.name) <> \"pinned\"
GROUP BY _id\n ---\n
UNION
SELECT \"all articles\" AS _id, -100 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.read_state = 1
UNION
SELECT \"all articles\" AS _id, -100 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.read_state < 1\n
---\n UNION
SELECT \"my recently starred\" AS _id, -6 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.starred_state = 1 AND entries.read_state = 1
UNION
SELECT \"my recently starred\" AS _id, -6 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.starred_state = 1 AND entries.read_state < 1 \n
---\n UNION
SELECT \"notes\" AS _id, -8 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.type = \"N\" AND entries.read_state = 1
UNION
SELECT \"notes\" AS _id, -8 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.type = \"N\" AND entries.read_state < 0 \n )
GROUP BY ord, _id;

CREATE VIEW entries_view AS SELECT entries._id AS _id, ENTRY_HASH, entries.ATOM_ID as ATOM_ID, ALTERNATE_URL, CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT_URL, entries.TITLE AS TITLE, FEED_ID, READ_STATE, READ_STATE_PENDING, STARRED_STATE, STARRED_STATE_PENDING, SHARED_STATE, SHARED_STATE_PENDING, PINNED_STATE_PENDING, FRIENDS_SHARED_STATE, UPDATED_UTC, DOWNLOADED, ERROR, feeds.TITLE as FEED_TITLE, DOWNLOAD_PREF, DISPLAY_PREF, feeds.ATOM_ID as FEED_ATOM_ID, AUTHOR, feeds.JS_ENABLED AS JS_ENABLED, SHARED_BY_FRIEND, TYPE, NOTE, NOTE_SUBMITTED_STATE, NOTE_SHOULD_BE_SHARED, feeds.ALT_URL AS FEED_ALTERNATE_URL, LIKED_STATE, LIKED_STATE_PENDING, feeds.FTW_ENABLED AS FTW_ENABLED, SNIPPET FROM feeds, entries WHERE feeds._id = entries.feed_id ORDER BY entries.UPDATED_UTC DESC

UPDATE
 entries
 SET
 read_state = 1, 
 read_state_pending = read_state_pending * -1 + 1
 -- END-OF-UPDATE
 WHERE
 read_state = 0 AND
 INSERTED_AT > ? AND
 -- D_L --
 rowid IN 
 (SELECT 
 entries.rowid
 FROM 
 entries
 
 -- feeds-needed
 ,feeds
 -- feeds-needed-end
 
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels
 -- labels-mark-end
 
 WHERE
 entries.read_state = 0
 AND entries.starred_state > ?
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ? 
 
 -- feeds-needed
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id
 -- feeds-needed-end
 

-- feeds-mark
 AND feeds._id = ?
 -- feeds-mark-end
 
 -- notification-feeds-mark
 AND feeds.NOTIFICATION > 0
 -- notification-feeds-mark-end
 
 -- labels-mark
 AND (lower(labels.name) = ? 
 AND entries._id = elas.ENTRY_ID AND elas.LABEL_ID = labels._id)
 -- labels-mark-end 
 --LIMIT-- 
)

SELECT 
 entries._id,
 entries.ATOM_ID,
 entries.ALTERNATE_URL,
 entries.CONTENT,
 entries.CONTENT_TYPE,
 entries.CONTENT_URL,
 entries.TITLE,
 entries.TITLE_TYPE,
 feeds.title as derived_feed_title,
 feeds.DOWNLOAD_PREF,
 feeds.DISPLAY_PREF,
 entries.FEED_TITLE_TYPE,
 entries.FEED_ID,
 entries.READ_STATE,
 entries.READ_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.STARRED_STATE,
 entries.STARRED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.LIKED_STATE,
 entries.LIKED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.SHARED_STATE,
 entries.SHARED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.PINNED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.UPDATED_UTC,
 entries.DOWNLOADED,
 entries.ERROR
, feeds.JS_ENABLED
, feeds.FTW_ENABLED
, entries.SHARED_BY_FRIEND
, entries.NOTE
, entries.SNIPPET
 FROM
 feeds,
 entries
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels
 -- labels-mark-end
 WHERE read_state < ?
 AND entries.INSERTED_AT > ?
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id
 AND entries.starred_state > ?
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ? 


 -- feeds-mark
 AND feeds._id = ?
 -- feeds-mark-end
 
 -- notification-feeds-mark
 AND feeds.NOTIFICATION > 0
 -- notification-feeds-mark-end
 
 -- labels-mark
 AND (lower(labels.name) = ? 
 AND entries._id = elas.ENTRY_ID AND elas.LABEL_ID = labels._id)
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 ORDER BY
 entries.UPDATED_UTC
UPDATE entries SET read_state = 1 WHERE entries.read_state = -1 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND read_state_pending = 0
UPDATE entries SET read_state = 1 WHERE entries.read_state = -1 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.entry_hash = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND read_state_pending = 0
UPDATE entries SET -STATE- = -SET- WHERE entries.-STATE- = -CLEAR- AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND -STATE_PENDING- = 0
UPDATE entries SET -STATE- = -SET- WHERE entries.-STATE- = -CLEAR- AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.entry_hash = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND -STATE_PENDING- = 0
DELETE FROM temp_ids WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM entries WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id )

SELECT
 _id
, atom_id
 FROM
 entries
 WHERE
 read_state_pending = 0 
 AND starred_state_pending = 0 
 AND shared_state_pending = 0 
 AND liked_state_pending = 0 
 AND pinned_state_pending = 0
 AND NOT (note_submitted_state = 0 AND note IS NOT null)
 -- MARK BEGIN 
 AND read_state = 1 
 -- MARK END 
 
 -- Starred Articles
 AND (entries.atom_id NOT IN ( 
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 WHERE 
 e2.starred_state = 1 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.read_state ASC
, e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?1) 
 
 -- Shared Articles
 AND entries.atom_id NOT IN (
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 WHERE 
 e2.shared_state = 1 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.read_state ASC
, e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?2) 
 
 -- Notes
 AND entries.atom_id NOT IN (
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 WHERE 
 e2.type = "N" 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.read_state ASC
, e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?3) 

AND entries.atom_id NOT IN (
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?4) 
 )

ORDER BY
 READ_STATE DESC
, -- prefer to delete read over unread over pinned 
 UPDATED_UTC ASC

DELETE FROM entries WHERE type = "N" 
 AND read_state_pending = 0 
 AND starred_state_pending = 0 
 AND shared_state_pending = 0 
 AND pinned_state_pending = 0 
 AND NOT (note_submitted_state = 0 AND note IS NOT null)
 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND read_state_pending = 0; DELETE FROM temp_ids
